title: OCE VOD Spoilers
body: Jumped into the VOD page to watch the matches that were played today, but it ruins it for me when the results are clearly displayed (in bright red and green text no less.) Is there an option for removing spoilers from this page?

replies.body:
Hey BolshieColt,

If you go to http://oce.lolesports.com/?mode=no-spoilers the scores should be hidden for the duration of your visit.

It's a hack and super unofficial, I put in for a couple players who had the same issue as you.  When you want the scores back, refresh your browser or hit 'http://oce.lolesports.com' again.
Thats really neat, thankyou very much this is exactly what we need :D :D :D
not that i know of. the oce lolesports page is incredibly lacking compared to the na one, doesn't even look like the results are fully updated yet

Hey Easley, yeah we ran into a production bug :(

The OPL has introduced a new scoring system (if you want you check it out here: http://oce.lolesports.com/articles/opl-points-system-explained-71984).  Things were going great until we hit the Exile5 vs Tainted Minds match.  The engineering team is going to resolve it, but we couldn't risk touching the system until the other leagues had completed their matches.

Sorry about the delay, I let you guys down on this one.

Wait didn't they update it to fix it like 2 years ago?

Also, watch them on youtube then, they are usually on there somewhere and unspoiled.

Yeh thats true, but what i love about the VOD page is that it has 3 links on every match for each game, so you dont know if a series ended after game 2. Acts as another sort of spoiler if you know who wins the best of 3 if they win the first game and dont playa third.
